page.title: 14CROSS COUNTRY,ARELEY ST'PORT
page.content: In the winter I go training, doing cross country running in Areley Wood. It is great fun running around and getting muddy, especially when it has been raining the day before .We have to run around the wood about 6 or 7 times.It is very difficult at first but after a while you get used to it.We don't do cross country running in the summer,we do training in Lickhill Park.I enjoy doing running in Areley Wood best.In the summer I look forward to doing it in the winter. The wood is quite small if you compare with other woods in this area.There are alot of hills and at each end of the wood there is a stream,sometimes it is quite deep.It is usually sloshy and muddy and very slippery.Sometimes you can hurt yourself when you fall over.
